column4: Hey I am trying to edit the Grub menu.lst file so my Windows will be the default top of the list guy... I go to try to save it and it says I dont have permissions... How can I login as root or how can I get the permissions or whatever to save the file?
what editor are you using? if it's graphical, you need to run it as gksudo <editor>, and if not you need to do sudo editor
its gedit... how do I do the gksudo?
press alt+f2, enter gksudo gedit, and then hit enter. but first BACK UP the file
